verses.verse: Now <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> who was of the <S%H8453>settlers<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> "As the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H5975>stand,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> there shall be <S%H518>neither<s%> <S%H2919>dew<s%> nor <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> by my <S%H6310>word.<s%>"
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1980>"Go<s%> away from <S%H2088>here<s%> and <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H9506>eastward,<s%> and <S%H5641>hide<s%> yourself by the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H3747>Cherith,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>east<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
"And it shall be that you shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook,<s%> and I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> to <S%H3557>provide<s%> for you <S%H8033>there.<s%>"

So he <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for he <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> by the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H3747>Cherith,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>east<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H1320>meat<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H1320>meat<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and he would <S%H8354>drink<s%> from the <S%H5158>brook.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>happened<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H7093><s%> a <S%H3117>while,<s%> that the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H3001>dried<s%> up, <S%H3588>because<s%> there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H6886>Zarephath,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belongs to <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> and <S%H3427>stay<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> a <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H3557>provide<s%> for you."

So he <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6886>Zarephath,<s%> and when he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H6607>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H490>widow<s%> was <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H9535>gathering<s%> <S%H6086>sticks;<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> to her and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H3947>get<s%> me a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in a <S%H3627>jar,<s%> that I may <S%H8354>drink.<s%>"

And as she was <S%H1980>going<s%> to <S%H3947>get<s%> [it,] he <S%H7121>called<s%> to her and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H3947>bring<s%> me a <S%H6595>piece<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

But she <S%H559>said,<s%> "As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> I <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H518>no<s%> <S%H4580>bread,<s%> <S%H3588>only<s%> <S%H518><s%> a <S%H4393>handful<s%> <S%H3709><s%> of <S%H7058>flour<s%> in the <S%H3537>bowl<s%> and a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> in the <S%H6835>jar;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H9535>gathering<s%> a <S%H8147>few<s%> <S%H6086>sticks<s%> that I may <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H6213>prepare<s%> for me and my <S%H1121>son,<s%> that we may <S%H398>eat<s%> it and <S%H4191>die.<s%>"

Then <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, "Do not <S%H3372>fear;<s%> <S%H935>go,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> as you have <S%H1697>said,<s%> but <S%H6213>make<s%> me a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5692>bread<s%> <S%H5692>cake<s%> from it <S%H7223>first,<s%> and <S%H3318>bring<s%> [it] out to me, and <S%H314>afterward<s%> you may <S%H6213>make<s%> [one] for yourself and for your <S%H1121>son.<s%>

"For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'The <S%H3537>bowl<s%> of <S%H7058>flour<s%> shall not be <S%H3615>exhausted,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall the <S%H6835>jar<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> be <S%H2637>empty,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>sends<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>'"
So she <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> and she and he and her <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> for [many] <S%H3117>days.<s%>

The <S%H3537>bowl<s%> of <S%H7058>flour<s%> was not <S%H3615>exhausted<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> did the <S%H6835>jar<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2637>become<s%> <S%H2637>empty,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H452>Elijah.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H802>woman,<s%> the <S%H1172>mistress<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H2470>became<s%> <S%H2470>sick;<s%> and his <S%H2483>sickness<s%> was <S%H3966>so<s%> <S%H2389>severe,<s%> that there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5397>breath<s%> <S%H3498>left<s%> in him.

So she <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> do I have to do with you, O <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>? You have <S%H935>come<s%> to me to <S%H2142>bring<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to <S%H2142>remembrance,<s%> and to <S%H4191>put<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H4191>death!<s%>"

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H5414>"Give<s%> me your <S%H1121>son.<s%>" Then he <S%H3947>took<s%> him from her <S%H2436>bosom<s%> and <S%H5927>carried<s%> him up to the <S%H5944>upper<s%> <S%H5944>room<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he was <S%H3427>living,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him on his own <S%H4296>bed.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> hast Thou <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7489>brought<s%> <S%H7489>calamity<s%> to the <S%H490>widow<s%> with <S%H834>whom<s%> I am <S%H1481>staying,<s%> by causing her <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%>?"

Then he <S%H4058>stretched<s%> himself upon the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> Thee, let <S%H2088>this<s%> child's <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to him."

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> and the <S%H5315>life<s%> of the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to him and he <S%H2421>revived.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and <S%H3381>brought<s%> him <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H5944>upper<s%> <S%H5944>room<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> him to his <S%H517>mother;<s%> and <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7200>"See,<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H2416>alive.<s%>"

Then the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> <S%H6258>"Now<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H571>truth.<s%>"
